Reviews.Title: “Very friendly,clean,warm and comfortable.”
Reviews.Author: Ricky W
Reviews.Content: stayed minute walk dam square plenty dont fancy walk tram stop outside doorwe stayed rear hotel returning hotel street quieti hesitate book hotel am genuine visitor hotel

Reviews.Title: “Privileged location”
Reviews.Author: M_Fernanda_L21
Reviews.Content: hotel des arts wonderful hotel heart amsterdam close street commercial street dam square royal palace flower market 500 offers easy acess main atractions amsterdam cable car walk prefer bike easy rent bike rent locations street welcoming clean classic beautiful decoration mine offers privileged view amstel river bad hotel dont elevators house isnt floor pick family doing eurotrip luggages floor awful

Reviews.Title: “Not ideal for families”
Reviews.Author: Mike H
Reviews.Content: gorgeous building outside fantastic central location stayed quad facing canal quieter children loved stairs beds display nonsmoking sign corridors smoked permeate smell pillows beds comfortable nights sleep museum 20 minutes walk breakfast ok lift steep stairs pain carrying suitcases wifi patchy cute dogs welcomed fresh towels everyday tea provided kettle cups

Reviews.Title: “What a nice place to stay”
Reviews.Author: katjanoack
Reviews.Content: unique family runned hotel visit amsterdam owners helpful hotel clean home breakfast cute romantic true hear lot walls guests pleasant quiet night expect original historical building hope little space

Reviews.Title: “this is a historic dump”
Reviews.Author: madamedestael
Reviews.Content: hotel looks nice photos family run hotel 17th century building canal soon door faint smell stain tobacco smoke haunt joint upstairs pay entire trip probably travellers leaving immediately seen cheerless bare commit breakfast read hearty plastic bags ham cheese horrible industrial bread bottled orange juice worst hotels stayed left found cheaper seven bridges half price clean welcoming

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel des Arts Amsterdam
HotelInfo.Address: Rokin 154-156, Amsterdam 1012 LE, The Netherlands
